about_the_game:
The Road To Recovery places you in the shoes of Ash, a recovering addict, starting at day one. Awoken by the sound of your phone ringing, you have ZERO memory of the night before. Explore Oakborough City, and "survive" day one!

The Road To Recovery features:
- An emotionally rich story revolving primarily around addiction/recovery and the struggles that come with it. But also, filled with messages that inspire, show hope, and let the player know "you are not alone!". *

-Explore Oakborough City, A beautifully hand drawn 2D world, brought to life with ambience, things to interact with (yes, you can pet kitties!), and other fully voice acted characters to meet!

-An emotionally charged soundtrack, specifically composed for the game!

*Designed and written by a recovering addict.

content_descriptors.notes: The games story primarily focuses on the struggles that can come with addiction. Mention/Use of illegal drugs and alcohol and other possibly sensitive subjects will be encountered throughout.
